# Numpy cheat sheet


## Matrix creation

### Creation: vector cases

For the random part, one is expected to run a command like
```Python
rng = np.random.default_rng(12)
```
before anything, to call the generator `rng`.

## Matrix reshaping
We start here with
```Python
M = np.zeros((3, 4))
M[2, 2] = 1
```

<center>
<image src = "./CheatSheet/figures/reshape-M.svg" width="200px"></image> 
</center>

Starting from the previous matrix, we can reshape it in different ways:

<table>
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>Code</th>
      <th>Result</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td> <pre>M = M.reshape(4, 3)</pre> </td>
            <td> <image src = "./CheatSheet/figures/reshape-M-reshape(4,3).svg" width="200px"></image> </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td> <pre>M = M.reshape(12, 1)</pre> </td>
            <td> <image src = "./CheatSheet/figures/reshape-M-reshape(12,1).svg" width="200px"></image> </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td> <pre>M = M.reshape(1, 12)</pre> </td>
            <td> <image src = "./CheatSheet/figures/reshape-M-reshape(1,12).svg" width="200px"></image> </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td> <pre>M = M.reshape(6, 2)</pre> </td>
            <td> <image src = "./CheatSheet/figures/reshape-M-reshape(6,2).svg" width="200px"></image> </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td> <pre>M = M.reshape(2, 6)</pre> </td>
            <td> <image src = "./CheatSheet/figures/reshape-M-reshape(2,6).svg" width="200px"></image> </td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>


## Slicing

Start from a zero matrix:
```Python
M = np.zeros((5, 9))
```

<center>
<image src = "./CheatSheet/figures/slice-M.svg" width="200px"></image> 
</center>


Starting from the previous matrix, we can slice it in different ways:

<table>
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>Code</th>
      <th>Result</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td> <pre>M[...] = 1 </pre> </td>
            <td> <image src = "./CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[...].svg" width="200px"></image> </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td> <pre>M[:, ::2] = 1</pre> </td>
            <td> <image src = "./CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[:,::2].svg" width="200px"></image> </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td> <pre>M[::2, :] = 1</pre> </td>
            <td> <image src = "./CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[::2,:].svg" width="200px"></image> </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td> <pre>M[1, 1] = 1</pre> </td>
            <td> <image src = "./CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[1,1].svg" width="200px"></image> </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td> <pre>M[:, 0] = 1</pre> </td>
            <td> <image src = "./CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[:,0].svg" width="200px"></image> </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td> <pre>M[0, :] = 1</pre> </td>
            <td> <image src = "./CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[0,:].svg" width="200px"></image> </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td> <pre>M[2:; 2:] = 1</pre> </td>
            <td> <image src = "./CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[2:,2:].svg" width="200px"></image> </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td> <pre>M[:-2:, :-2] = 1</pre> </td>
            <td> <image src = "./CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[:-2,:-2].svg" width="200px"></image> </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td> <pre>M[2:4, 2:4] = 1</pre> </td>
            <td> <image src = "./CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[2:4,2:4].svg" width="200px"></image> </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td> <pre>M[::2, ::2] = 1</pre> </td>
            <td> <image src = "./CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[::2,::2].svg" width="200px"></image> </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td> <pre>M[3::2, 3::2] = 1</pre> </td>
            <td> <image src = "./CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[3::2,3::2].svg" width="200px"></image> </td>
